def_cn: 脚步不稳的；身体摇晃的
def_en: If you are unsteady, you have difficulty doing something, for example walking, because you cannot completely control your legs or your body.

def_cn: 不稳定的；不可靠的；无法捉摸的；变幻无常的
def_en: If you describe something as unsteady, you mean that it is not regular or stable, but unreliable or unpredictable.

def_cn: 不牢固的；不稳固的；不结实的
def_en: Unsteady objects are not held, fixed, or balanced securely.
